solution_line_template: In {days_until_birthday} days she will have {days_until_birthday} days * ${savings_per_day}/day = $<<{days_until_birthday}*{savings_per_day}={total_savings}>>{total_savings}
A flower costs ${cost_per_flower} so she can buy ${total_savings} / ${cost_per_flower}/flower = <<{total_savings}/{cost_per_flower}={num_flowers}>>{num_flowers} flowers
